data.comment: Goal! Vitesse take a 1-0 lead through a well-placed header from Jacob Rasmussen.
In the minute 9, Maximilian Wittek instrumental with a fine assist.
The first-half is over at Gelredome.
The second-half is underway in Arnhem.
In the minute 50, Goal! Olivier Boscagli (Eindhoven) levels the score at 1-1 with a header in Arnhem.
Philipp Max with an assist there.
Lois Openda is on target to give Vitesse a 2-1 advantage.
In the minute 54, Great play from Maximilian Wittek to set up the goal.
The home team have replaced Daan Huisman with Tomas Hajek. This is the first substitution made today by Thomas Letsch.
Roger Schmidt (Eindhoven) is making a first substitution, with Donyell Malen replacing Ryan Thomas.
In the minute 65, Sondre Tronstad for Vitesse has been booked by Bas Nijhuis and receives a first yellow card.
It seems as if Lois Openda is unable to continue. Thomas Buitink replaces him for the home team.
Thomas Buitink (Vitesse) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 82, The home team replace Maximilian Wittek with Enzo Cornelisse.
Vitesse make their fourth substitution with Oussama Darfalou replacing Armando Broja.
Eli Dasa is booked for the home team.
In the minute 89, Adrian Fein is replacing Chukwunonso Madueke for Eindhoven at Gelredome.
It's 2-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
